place_description: Counter-serve bakery/cafe chain serving sandwiches, salads & more, known for its bread & free WiFi.

reviews_data.review_text: I normally don't write bad reviews, but I waited 20 minutes in the drive through for a soup and half salad. There were no cars behind me or ahead of me. The girl working the window didn't apologize for the wait and just handed me my food and slammed the window door. i came back to show the manager the BUG that i found in the bottom of my salad after i ate the whole thing. no apology, just gave me a refund. i used to work at panera so i would usually understand but there's no excuse for any of this. it's just laziness.
Liogkii zavtrak!delovye i semeinye vstrechi.ochen' uiutno

FIX YOUR DRIVE THRU PANERA!

Make cars pulls up OR don't take new orders and leave that for pick ups only! It's ridiculous we have to wait over 10 mins to grab something that was done when I got here 10 mins ago!

My favorite place for soup.
The broccoli cheese in a breadbowl is delicious.

I learned that the "soup bowl w/ side of chips instead of baguette since I'm already getting my soup in a bread bowl" did NOT mean it would be in a bread bowl but rather a non-edible bowl. I'll know next time. Still very good, of course.
Food was outstanding

I ordered french onion soup, but she kept saying tomato....so after three attempts to correct her, I gave up. Ate the tomato soup, I was on lunch hour and just needed it quickly..... Service was so slow through drive thru, it took me over 8 minutes. Yikes, I won't do that again. Disappointed. It can't take that long to get soup, especially when it was not busy.
if i can give a zero i would.. over an hour wait for a soup and a grilled cheese. I'm over it! Panera Bread get it together....

I met a special friend here, Waverly location for lunch. I got the 2 plus (?); Creamed  tomato soup with a sandwich.   The soup tasted like it was made by my mother... delicious!!! The sandwich was a delight!!! This was the first time ever to eat Panera food. I used to only drink coffee with another friend on Monroe.
This location really needs to tell big orders to pull up or park, at the drive thru. Only one car ahead of me And I Waited behind for 20mins just for a drink.... Unfortunately, this happens often.
1st time and I enjoyed the experience.  Picked up 4 Bread Bowls for some shrimp and grits I made.
Great
Always a great experience
an hour to serve you the food too long Time

Check your order before you leave. Customized a half Fuji salad and still got tomatoes, no cucumbers that I added, and the dressing in the side did not make it into the bag- no point in this salad without the dressing.

Flavor is on point, but quantity is not good.
But you can really see the quality of the food .
Recommended .
Very clean, the service was quick and friendly. It wasn't too crowded. Will be returning.
Silver was super rude.  We came in and she couldn't even say hi, and when I said good morning she replied with a "hmm."  Like really, you couldn't even replied back with a Hi!
Very good and clean

I couldn't  be more upset. I went to Panera this morning in the drive through waited 20 minutes for a bagel and a drink. After I received it was burnt. When asking the drive through person why the long delay he indicated he was the only one working.

Honestly that no my or no one else's fault for poor and long service.. Tried to call was placed on hold and then hung up on.

Very upset with this location.
Good service, delicious coffee.

The food here is always amazing! The front staff are always so kind and so is the kitchen staff. Joshua, Cali and Shannon have always been so kind and very professional every time I've come through the drive thru!! This place is always super clean too! My husband and I will continue to come to this Panera and will recommend to friends!
Absolutely ridiculous! Paid $12 for pick two and this is how the sandwich looks like. There are short selling when you order pick up.

**Review of Panera's Tuna Salad Sandwich**

I recently purchased a tuna salad sandwich from Panera and noticed what looked like dirt on the bread. When I brought this to the manager's attention, she explained that it was residue from the cooking pans. This raises an important concern about the cleaning schedule for these pans. The appearance of the sandwich was disappointing. I hope Panera enhances their cleaning practices to ensure a more appealing presentation in the future.
My Tomato Basil BLT had the 2 smallest bacon that I've ever seen. Sandwich was all bread. Not even close to the pictures you have on the website!
This is what I received vs what I ordered. It is unacceptable to serve food of this quality to paying customers. Not what I expected from Panera.
Vse super)
The only negatives a have to say is about no person available for take your order. All have to be done kiosk thru .
We would come more often for one hour client lunches if the WiFi was stronger, about the equivalent to stream ten minute Team calls. Cinnamon rolls are also rock hard but menu's otherwise decent

THIS LOCATION IS RACIST! THE WORSE CUSTOMER SERVICE I'VE EVER RECEIVED AT A PANERA BREAD, EVER! Long story short, went through the drive thru, and my oatmeal order was prepared wrong, and they gave me Slimy Strawberries that had a strong sour smell!

I informed the young lady at window so it could be remade, young lady says that's what comes on the oatmeal - I said yes I am aware and I literally asked for it Not to be on mine... she then tells the lady doing the food it needs to be remade but I noticed the attitude, shoulder shrugs, and a whole convos about it.

Therefore, I went inside asked for a manager, I proceed to tell the 1st "manager" (who wasn't much of a manager) that the order was wrong and need to be remade but I didn't understand the attitude and showed her the very Slimy Strawberries and offered for her to smell the strawberries - she then says very loudly "Don't throw the strawberries in my face!" in front of another customer who they were ignoring at the cafe pick-up area (inside)... I said Ma'am I literally didn't throw anything at you, I asked you to smell how spoiled they are... She gets an attitude, then here comes another "manager" (2nd Team) and ask what's the issue I then explain it and she too gets an attitude and says they don't make enough money for this... I said That's not my issue, my issue is the order was wrong and y'all got an attitude with me the customer and I happen to be a stockholder for Speaking up about it, and asking for fresh food and the correct order... I literally left, without the food, without the refund and called corporate and it shall get handled!
 SHAME ON THIS PANERA BREAD!!!

Worst customer service ever! I had a server named Cali in the drive through. She was rude at the order box and when I got to the window there was no one behind me. I asked for an additional souffle and she rolled her eyes at me and scuffed. Then when she came to take payment she very rudely educated me to order at the box next time. I didn't expect this. I don't intend on returning back to this location. I didn't order a side of attitude.
I've only ate here once and I ordered macaroni and cheese. It was a long wait but the macaroni was actually really good.

This place has seriously gone down hill. Every time we've been here they somehow manage to mess up our orders every time. I honestly don't know why I even gave them another try but 3 sandwiches and $50 later they still live up to their disappointment. Only one sandwich was remotely okay, the others were missing ingredients or had little to none. This is definitely the last time we'll eat at this location.

Why is it when you place a door dash order not during a busy time there is not someone who checks the orders?!?! I am disabled an ordered dinner for myself and my husband had already eaten and just wanted a cookie which of course was not in the bag. I ordered a salad and a cookie!!! Also paid delivery rate on the order!
Clean Panera with friendly staff. Popped in for a citrus punch and was back on the road quickly
Nice meeting place.  Prompt service and plenty of working space.
Food is great and service too
Clean restaurant fresh food

Been here twice in the morning and keep getting the wrong.

Don't get the BLT. It's nothing but bread like most sandwiches now. At least Waffle House has a real BLT.

You dumber get extra ingredients that you ask for either. My sandwich was so dry
I was there for the meeting, didnt get a chance to eat
Great food!

Got the tuna sandwich for the first time. Still thinking about that delicious tuna sandwich the next day. Was fluffy, not heavy, perfect balance of mayo and other mix ins and the sourdough bread was bakery fresh. Delightful and I will be making this my "go to" order from Panera from now on!
The broccoli soup was thick and disgusting. Looks like they mixed mac and cheese with broccoli because it's not soup

There was a large cockroach in the womens bathroom. I told an employee that was by the restroom and he responded "that's not my department."
No one did anything about it so I said something again as he was still standing around talking to other employees. His response now was "I'm off the clock" and still no one moved to get the roach. Very unprofessional!
I was very disappointed in this Panera and will never return to this location.

I worked at panera as a teenager , it was all about customer service back then, but the kids you have running the drive through window are ridiculous.  They never give receipts, they want to argue with you that whip cream comes on all coffees even when you ask for almond milk and no dairy and they ALWAYS  forget any butter you order with your bagel. Hands down the worst panera I've ever been to. I have given this place multiple chances and not ONCE have they ever gotten my order correct or provided a reciept.

The order was perfectly fine and the service was great at the pick up window, but I started eating my fruit cup and there was a brownish blonde hair in it. Completely different color than my own. Very unsanitary.
Don't waste your time here , horrible service and customer service. Never take care of their customers when they mess everything up

5 estrellas hoy fui a este lugar por una orden para entrega y tenia que esperar mientras esperaba me ordene una limonada y al momento de recibir mi limonada tuve que hacer unas de mis pendejadas del dia se me cayo mi limonada pero recibi otra limonada de portaron muy amables yo decia a cada rato I'm sorry ellos me decian no te preocupes no hay problema. Muy chidos los que trabajan ahi. Y ya

this place never fails to mess our order up. whether that be  forgetting an item , cold soup, soggy food , skimping on toppings when you ask for extra.  tiny and i mean tiny sandwiches. perhaps they need a new manager to train the children working there.. feels like a daycare center in there. come on now. will go to the matthews one from now on.

They closed at 7:30.
Please fox on maps
Sometimes makes you wait as a doordasher but usually on time

EVERY SINGLE TIME I IRDER DELIVERY OR TO GO SOMETHING IS MISSING!  If I call to ask why they promise to refund, but never do!
Extremely disappointed today, got my delivery bit no drink! Unless I m there to check, no one checks.

From all Paneras I've been to, this is the only one location that has poor customer service and poor manager. I always order the same stuff and only at this location I always have issues with my order.
1. Kids deli turkey sandwich sounds really simple to make - just bread, turkey and cheese. I received either grilled cheese, either turkey sandwich with salad in it. Oh, and they can't cut it in half for some reason. It's the only Panera I've received any excuse for cutting my kids sandwich in half lol why, I still don't have the true answer.
2. Usually half of sandwich looks pretty decent half everywhere but not in this Panera. I always switch to Country Sourdough bread and their side of half sandwich is smaller than the kids size meal lol I mean, it's like literally 1/3 of the whole sandwich. When you order the same sandwich pretty often, you expect to receive the same thing as always. Well, not here!
3. One time ordered tuna sandwich as usual and got some chicken chipotle stuff. After that always check my order in front of the window.
4. One time I ordered Broccoli Cheddar Soup and it was iced in the middle of the cup lol Today I received this soup liquid as water.
5. Manager said that they will make me a new sandwich but it's going to be exactly the same size when I was explaining to her that this is not usual half of the sandwich I receive. I'd be fine to stay with this one but she already touched it with her hands so I was agreed to receive a new one. Guess what? They gave me the same sandwich I got for the first time saying that it's a new one lol why?
Today when I came inside to solve the issue with my order again lol I heard like the girl from stuff was kinda annoyed than something is going to happen now if I'm standing with my two opened sandwiches. Manager was giving me all excuses and reasons kinda to tell me that I was wrong. I don't know, just not my place I guess because I always have some problems with my order, stuff and manager in general.
Food tasted great but they have yet to label any of the sandwiches when we order. We usually get the family feast but they raised the price more than $5 so we have not gotten it as much.
Clean and well put together.

This is becoming an increasing problem across most paneras. Light roast is usually out, half and half is usually out you go to wait in front of the line nobody's there everybody's in the back. Again until the line builds up and everyone starts getting nancy and starting to look for people at the food window.

Being a strip club member I can see how Panera is going a little bit downhill across all of Charlotte. Now it's becoming increasingly frustrating since you can't pop in grab your cup of coffee with the iPad. Have to wait in line to receive your cup usually it's not there automatically have to go ask for it Wait again until they find it. Then you get to the coffee the coffee is out. Until you get your coffee to half and half is out.

My orders are always correct and accurate but today that wasn't so. Order completed incorrectly. I was expecting accuracy, but received an inaccurate order. I am an unsatisfied customer.

I ordered through doordash, but the dasher was awesome, not his fault. It's the workers who made and sent out an incorrect order.

Photo of receipt included for proof
Maybe a good place to meet friends but the food is average. Costco food court is much better at better price.
Healthy tasty food, excellent fast service.

Went late and they were "out of bread", yet we were staring at racks and racks of....yep, BREAD! I was flabbergasted. Ordered the "warm bread bowl", which was delicious despite the complete lack of bread. The employees were very friendly and gave us some of what appeared to be sandwich rolls, as they were sliced. Again, not a bad meal, just not what I was expecting.
Thanks
Enjoyed getting it doordashed to me!
People are always so sweet. Food is good better by far than your classic drive through
I love that this spot has a drive thru.  I got my broccoli cheddar soup & warmed up on a cold night without leaving my car! Perfect! The cashier was kind and had great customer service.
Very slow service, often make mistakes in take out orders.

I have always loved Panera food and am a fan. When I went last time, I ordered half a dozen bagels to go and they asked me if I want in slices and so I said yes. What I found when I came back to house was very old chewy bagels horribly cut. I guess it was so bad they couldn't even cut properly. They could have just told me it's too old buy something else. But they sold some old bagels for one time money making. Now I am not sure if I will buy bagels again here. Adding a picture of one of the bagels I was heating up
Great food.
Always wonderful.  It was very clean and sunny inside.
New 6.99 deals are very good!
I work near this one. Be prepared to wait in line your whole 30 minute lunch majority of the time. Also food is sometimes cold.. for the price of this, everything should be phenomenal but it isn't.

No baguettes, no baguettes, no baguettes 3 times now for evening soup . What is that? Isn't that what most people eat with their soup???? Just stopped I told the girl no cheese in my soup 3 times, do not like that cheese , just got home cheese in my onion soup , oh and they don't answer the phone either and still no baguettes again, piss poor customer service!
Great atmosphere and food.  Comfortable place to sit for a while and not feel rushed.
This location is always good. Best to order from the app. I don't think the cashiers are used to people ordering at the counter much anymore. It's always clean here and staff is nice

This is a great location for Panera!
Our pick up order was ready quickly, and our sandwiches very delicious!
It was a chill day perfect for soup and it was delicious!
Broccoli&cheese soup and chicken&BBQ sandwich are perfect  :)

Disappointed with many things. The drinks tasted off and I definitely overpaid for what I got. Half a salad, a parfait, and a drink totaled just under $20. Not sure how much falls on the location or the company as a whole, but I will say I've gone to better Paneras and did not feel cheated.

I hate Panera, but we ordered it for some reason. They left the Mac n Cheese out of our order. 9$ for half a sandwich is a crime. They also didn't really "grill" my grilled cheese. The day this chain dies I'll celebrate over their grave.
bagel was rock hard and they forgot the cream cheese. Food is very overpriced for actual quality, wont be coming back

It was a mobile order and I thought I'd take the drive thru to pick up my food. Big mistake! Took 35 mins for 6 cars. I ordered tomato soup and a grilled cheese sandwich. It was cold and stuck to the paper wrapper. Even worse, it wasn't grilled as far as i could tell. It was terrible. Really disappointing because now i can't trust the place.
Panera is overpriced. John Francis liked this place because he burnt his tastebuds off eating literally fire. My dad died
Staff was friendly and food was great! Love their broccoli and cheddar soup soooo good
Eehhh
Khoroshii restoran. Udobnoe mesto. Chisto. Vkusno prigotovleny bliuda. Vezhlivyi personal. Parkovochnykh mest dostatochno. Mne vsio podkhodit.

Upset that Panera has chosen Not to support breast cancer month . No longer making cherry vanilla bagel. Been to N And S Carolina. Was told they won't be doing them.
No need to go back.

Understaffed.
Pulled in drive through 9:30am Sunday. Two cars in front. 6 minutes later only one car's ordered. Two cars at order window waiting. Pulled out of line. Go inside, Order Asiago bagel sliced, toasted, plain cream cheese at 9:37. Recieve warm, not toasted bagel at 9:41am.

This site is woefully understaffed. They are kind and they try.

Edit: for spelling

I am so impressed with the customer service at this establishment. I placed an order through their app that was delivered via doordash. Unfortunately the driver left my drink at the restaurant and was unreachable. When I called the restaurant about the missing drink and one other small issue, the manager absolutely went above and beyond to rectify the situation. I was offered several options and never for a moment felt like I was being a "problem customer." Both the manager and one of their employees blew my mind with their customer service - I will 100% continue to frequent this location and recommend it to anyone who enjoys Panera. All other locations and restaurants should follow this store's lead. Mistakes happen even at the best of stores, but this level of customer service is not seen as often today. I am insanely impressed and pleased and will be back again!
Great food! Very Clean place!
I just bought cold green tea and it has a moldy smell, so it can poison people. Be careful!

This location continues to not bake enough bagels to last through the day. This morning around 11:40 a.m. they only had chocolate chip left. What is the problem? Please get it together. Also, it's Saturday. No excuse to not know what type of crowd to expect throughout the morning/early afternoon.

The Indian trail location never disappoints on customer service. Christina was the one working the drive thru, I remember because we share the same name! So friendly! I gave it 4 stars because of the broccoli chicken bowl. This was my first time trying it. There wasn't anything special about it. Maybe if they added match stick carrots? It just needs more. Underwhelming. But! I know the are puritans out there that will love the simplicity.
As always the broccoli cheddar soup, no fail!

Terrible. Had a terrible experience hear. The food is lousy customer service was bad they had an attitude I order a grilled cheese and it was literally cheese on bread. No napkins or spoons in the bag just awful bad customer service these people are lazy

Man, let me tell you. This was like slapstick comedy hour, these unexperienced teens we literally all in normal shoes and falling and dropping food they'd later serve. This one visit was a fiasco, This food was for a baby, which I put in the instructions but was still going to be served floor food. I got a refund and left, wait a month or two for them to get new employees.
I'm Confused, The employees confused , don't know what to make of this ... first time coming to a Panera and I get this deconstructed salad? Why
Was not fond of the food. Too pricey
Delicious

I used to love Panera Bread. I ordered a Chicken Ceasar Salad and it was mediocre at best. There wasn't very much Lettuce or Chicken and the complimentary bread was so small, I almost didn't see it in the bag. There was two half-filled containers of salad dressing. The whole meal was sub-par. If I felt like driving back I would have returned it and requested a refund. They are on my list or should I say off my list.

I come into this Panera once in a while to pick up bagels and coffee for my team at work and they never let me down.  Bagels are always fresh, the hazelnut coffee is great, and the service is wonderful (even at 7 in the morning).

If you want to feed a bunch of people, the baker's dozen bagels is a great deal.
Everything about them is nice. Love it!!!!!
CONVENIENTLY LOCATED ALONG HWY 74, BESIDE KFC !!!!
Services is always quick and good here. Staff is friendly and restaurant is clean.
Overpriced for average tasting food.

Truly amazing experience I haven't been to this location yet and was late for our pickup but it was still very fresh and the very nice employee Tylee with the lovely Braids helped make sure we had our full order and were truly satisfied she was so nice makes me want to go again! Everyone looked happy there and the most important part of a place to me is seeing that the employees are happy and the customers are relaxed well done everyone very good energy  much love it was all great!!
Busy location
Great Food Served Hot.Never has long wait in Drive Thru.

They were out of several types of bagels by 10am on a Friday morning sadly (everything and plain). The souffles were very good. They other bagels we got were fairly anemic. And my son didn't even want his chocolate chip bagel, said it didn't taste right. Just disappointed in the bagels.
Food was made quickly and was good.  The person that rung me out was very nice.
The friendliest Panera in Charlotte
Food was very tasty and fresh.

Panera bread is a go-to staple in our house. The cheddar broccoli soup is dynamite! The new Buffalo chicken sandwich is delightful. The service at all times is stellar.  I have not had a bad meal here yet. I have made some poor choices and given myself FOMO (Fear of missing out). For breakfast, try the souffle. The cheese and artichokes souffle is very good. Coffee is also very good. Atmosphere is like being at a log cabin or a down home feel. One especially nice perk of Panera is its no plastic utensils.  Real plates and such. Overall it's a good meal for a very decent price. I would recommend this establishment.  All food is natural, no preservativesor fake colors.

I was disappointed that almost half my bread was missing. For the price,  I did expect this to be noticed. I've worked in the food industry and wouldn't serve this bread (please note that the picture doesn't do it justice and it missing more than it looks like lol). Other than this, panera is usually really good and this won't really stop me from eating her again just maybe check my food before leaving lol.

First, let me say that I like panera. It is a little on the pricey side but the quality of the food is worth or should be. My most recent experience was fine, employees are nice and professional, quick and smooth ordering process. However,  when I opened my food after getting there,  I was disappointed to find half my sandwich bread was missing and most all of the chicken was on that half of the sandwich.  It nothing more than faulty bread but if it were me working, I wouldn't serve it. For the price, I do expect better.

This restaurant is very slow. The young lady at the window told me it wouldn't be long. Then she came back and moved me to Spot 2. I waited about 15 minutes just to get the wrong food. I ordered a Smoky buffalo sandwich, broccoli soup and a Apple. I was given the Pepperoni sandwich instead.
I tried their tuna and surprisingly it was very good..it's my new favorite sandwich!! Make sure to ask for fresh soft bread when you make your order..
Always love Panera. The food was ready quickly and delicious as usual. Clean comfortable location. A worker took our trays as we were going to dispose of them. Nice touch I thought.
Food was great and quick service!
Riley is amazing! She made our night!!!
Sat in drive thru for 16 minutes of my lunch break. Ridiculous it was
Everything  is always Yummo! Employers are SO kind and friendly!!!
Poor customer service. I was the only person in line. Totally ignored by staff.

I go to many different Panera locations on my travels. The Sip club is a great deal. This location is really well run and maintained. Tables are clean. Soda fountains and the coffee station are spotless. I also love the airy room and open space. They keep the music at a low volume which is much appreciated. Food came quickly and was great. Wi-Fi is super slow, though
Absolutely love this place and the staff is great.

My sandwich looked like it was put together by my 2 year old. Very sloppy looking presentation. Also when I got a text saying my food was ready, I showed up to the counter and nothing was there to be picked up so I waited a couple minutes and this girl with green hair put it on the counter without saying a word and just had her back turned the whole time. Kind of a weird vibe.
I am always met with warm greetings and smiles. The staff is awesome.
Great front service,  great deals and awesome food choices

Food was good, but a pick 2 lunch, sandwich and soup, plus a water were over $17 for 1 person. What happened to good food and good prices?

It was delicious, but waaaay overpriced, $7 for a cup, yes a cup of soup. It was good but not $7 good. They need to reevaluate their pricing, going to lose a lot of people. I will not return to Panera again, too many other great places out there.
The flatbread pizza was great!
Always out of bagettes and soups at this location.  Disappointing for $30 for 2 sandwiches.

Seemed like they had a challenge with staffing the day I went. Many people just decided to leave the drive thru line because the wait was very long. I did wait, the food was okay, nothing impressive this day. They typically are better, maybe just an off day with staff.

They are SO slow, and there food is just heat and seve although they charge like its homemade.... Staff attitudes are hit or miss; but generally off-putting... I give it the 4stars because the food is so good and it's always clean. Pre-made or not it's always delicious and the same. I enjoy consistency. Price is way too high
Good
Good food and fairly quick service.  Sometimes some of the coffee is out.

This Panera is one of the cleanest. And I've never been told they are out of something on the menu here.  Good atmosphere,  family friendly, nice fire place. Food was good.  Soup not very hot but could eat it warm.
Turkey Chilli soup was warm and it tasted funny, not good.

I love the pick 2 soup and sandwich. Brought home scones and muffins to enjoy with coffee next morning.  Lunch with a dear friend/neighbor. Good service and food.  Clean dine in. Thank goodness for drive thru too!!
Need more 4 person tables. To many 2 tops. People want to put their computer e the table to work. Small tables are a waste of area.

Soup was very good! We ordered 3 flat bread, 2 large soups and a chicken sandwich.  The Flatbread was so burnt and dark. The restaurant floor was super sticky and the bathroom water was too hot to wash hands. I notified someone about the bathroom water being too hot and no one fixed it.
Love the soup and  bowls/ salads..The yuzu mango drink is to die for!! Service is quick and friendly!
Food was delicious,  establishment and facilities was spotless.

Dear visitors of this restaurant, know that you are not eating fresh products and bread, they have been leaving bread pastries since yesterday to sell the next day, although they have written fresh every day, CAREFUL  if you get sick, know where it is from .... I have a complete  proof 100% according to the manager

Awful! Literally 2 girls in dining room with friends talking while working.. at least 4 in kitchen and orders taking over 20 minutes because they're messing around . And I'll add at least 3 of them on their phones behind counter

I have tried calling this location 4 times in the past 30 min and no one answers. I left there with cold turkey chili, not realizing it until we were back on the highway (10 min later) home (4hrs away). I simply was going to let the store know their chili is cold so it's not served to other customers that way.
Is it rising cost or what!!!! Not sure how this is over $45 worth of foodMaybe it's because of Russias war with Ukraine

I used the curbside pick up today and what a regretful experience. I waited 15 minutes and had to pull around to the drive-thru window to retrieve my meal. I called the store several times only to be disconnected each time.  The going lady at the window was quite nice and brought me my order but where was the breakdown? Do better or don't offer the service.
Good food
One of my best places where I can go with a friend or family, drink a coffee and have a good conversation

I keep trying to patron this establishment to keep being disappointed!!!! Every time my family orders take out, something gets left off!! This is so frustrating!!! And when I call to discuss the problem, no one answers!!! My family is a witness! Hence why I'm taking matters into my hands and forming this review.  You guys must do better!!! My salad had no cheese, hardly any chicken and I had hardly any dressing in the take home containers!!!! But I paid $14.82 for a salad and green tea????!!!! This IS NOT OKAY!!!

UPDATED:  have revisited this location and much better.  Seems I had one bad experience so improving my rating.  Panera reached out to me for feedback on original post, seems they made efforts to improve due to negative feedback.  Keep it up, we will be back.

The worst Panera Bread!  Every time I order delivery, they screw it up.  Every time!  At least 1 item is always missed.  The French Onion soup tasted like it was made in a dirty pot, had to throw it away.  No one answers when you call the store.  Spend a few more minutes driving and go to Matthews...or somewhere else.  Awful!  Why even offer delivery, if you can't get it right?  Management is a joke
Great fuji apple salad
Evert time I come to this location,  I have 2 park and wait. Its only a small order, 1-2 things and I wait forever.  I will never come back again.
Usually ok but out of bread ALOT.
For some reason cookies never make it into the pickup bag.
Good coffee. Good bear claw. Clean place. Not my favorite layout, though, especially when there by myself. Service good, but not very cheerful in the end.
Super nice people!  I love the bagel deal on Tuesdays. The sip club is wonderful. My only complaint is their ice coffee is weaker than my dead flower garden.
I am so happy this location has opened up. Now I can grab something to eat for breakfast on my way to work!
The food was amazing. The turkey avocado blt was the best and that's saying alot since I don't really like avocado.
Great food and service
They helped get my large order quickly when I was in a bind.
They stopped serving at the table and no longer grill the sandwiches.  Not what I expected.
Great food as always
I ordered 2 Flatbread pizzas and when they brought it out to me, it had an extra broken piece of bread. See picture.  No wonder I hear a lot of bad things about this place.

After reading several low-star reviews, my expectation were quite low, but this Panera blew me away! They were well staffed, fast, accurate, friendly, and everything was very clean. They had visible managerial oversight (which is always nice to see) and there was a relaxed vibe throughout the entire restaurant AND the food was great. Great job, Panera!
Don't order the roast turkey and avocado BLT. Just don't.
Food is always tasty, but a little pricey.
Very good service and food was good

Great food and service. New location has an open floorplan that is bright and fresh. Still have the single seat areas around the fireplace for curling up with a book, however the traditional nook booths to meet up with friends, clients or homework are noticeably absent in this floorplan. Not to say you can't still hold them there - just something to be mindful of.
Always a great place to go and eat, Ride On
Food good and place clean.

Food is usually good, but every time I order they forget something and the order is wrong. This time it was my cookie they forgot and my sandwich wasn't right. Picked up the order, got all the way home and it wasn't in there. Usually I check for everything but this time the husband and son picked it up and only half checked. They never mark the sandwiches either so you know which one is which. You have to open them to figure it out which is ok if it is for your own family, but not when you order for others outside of your family. Have been trying to get ahold of them since last evening and no one answers the phone. Guess I have to make a special trip to get the cookie and let them know my sandwich was wrong since they don't like to answer their phone.

I used to love bringing my kiddos into the store until I had a very uncomfortable situation arise. I politely asked one of the managers who seemed pretty young about why my food was taking so long to be prepared. There was no one in line before me. I waited for 30 minutes before receiving my food that was cold. When I did ask I was greeted with a cold remark from said manager about how they were really busy. I came in around 2pm and was extremely upset when getting that kind of response and was annoyed by my food being cold. I will not be returning to this location.

I've been here plenty of times and the experience is either great or not great at all. My order has been incorrect multiple times and I did a curbside order and no one came out to bring it. This last time that I picked up my salad all of the leaves were dead.
Fast and not a long wait

Today my mom and I went to Panera and had lunch, we got our meals and we also got a brownie to share. We ate our food inside the building and we weren't going to eat the brownie until we were home. When we got in the car after our lunch I noticed there was something flying around in the brownie bag. I immediately got grossed out and saw that there was a bug on our brownie. I had to throw away the brownie and never got to eat it.

Since the move to the new location beside KFC,. I have found the restaurant to be different.  No longer the cozy place with private booths and smiling familiar faces, the decor is cold and uninviting.  I stopped going.  Can no longer have a quiet little brkfst while reading a book.  The familiar staff that knew me by name is hidden behind prep walls.  No privacy.  Open tables.  Bland.

I ordered thru door dash, half grilled cheese & half broccoli cup mac & cheese. Grilled cheese came with NO cheese
& mac & cheese was filled 1/3 full. I love this place but that was disappointing.
As always, the food is great, kind service, but the prices are just a bit high.  I suppose it's worth it if you're looking for something that tastes good and is not fast food.
The food was excellent and anna the little girl that took my order Was very sweet
Overall great food and clean location. Had some issues with an order but it was handled very well and got a full refund for the situation

What is with my favorite item 'Toasted Steak and Cheddar sandwich' always being unavailable?
It's been over a week now

I came to the counter to ask for a spoon and heard the manager in the back screaming at a worker. i asked the worker at the counter what was going on and they said this is a usual occurrence. the food was great but the management seemed off. the workers were all great!

This place is a great quick in and out for nutritious clean fast food. Love the monthly sip club. Saving so much money on iced coffee it feels like stealing and the baja bowl is great for post workout protein.
Muy vien amables con las personas y la comida  atiempo
Very good!
Lunch and service is always good!
Cost a fortune for what they give you. Probably won't ever go back.
Coffee was delicious.  I had a huge glazed cinnamon roll..  It was excellent.
Great food but $$$ ...ouch!
My wife loves the sour dough bread bowl with cheddar and broccoli soup.
Great food

My favorite lunch spot
Very nice staff and clean food
Love their new Thai chicken soup and Asian salad
Placed my order via the App, picked it up curbside....Fast,  friendly and fresh!!!! 10/10 recommend!!!

After a glitch with our order, we spoke with the manager, Laura and she made sure that everything was taken care of right away. The food was fantastic and the service is commendable. Thank you to everyone at this Panera!
Excelente comida, excelente atencion, el lugar muy bonito y limpio
The kid in the green hat with the Saturn blimp pin did an amazing job making my salad. The portions were perfect and the flavor was immaculate. I believe his name tag started with a T. great place
I've never tried this place before but I will go back.  I stopped in for a quick breakfast and coffee and they served it up
Very nice location

Two sandwiches, two drinks $32.
Food all over the floor and dirty tables.
Food is pretty good, although portions are more for my wife than me.  I plan to just try to stay away from chains moving forward.  Lots of pretty signs and decor.  More about the sizzle than the substance.
Hot and deliciuos soups and fresh bread. I loved the warm and soft place. Excelent! / Deliciosas sopas y pan del dia. Me encanto el lugar, acogedor y comodo. Excelente!!
Love this place delicious food

I always order delivery and it is not always reliable.  Today my food was left on the steps outside the condo building.It was supposed to be brought up to our unit. I wasn't even notified that it had been delivered there. When I called to find out why my order had not been delivered the phone rang and no one ever picked up.
Clean facility.pleasant personnel.Good food and pricing.
Clean, efficient, and friendly staff.
Over priced!!
Good but cold when it got to is. Portions fluctuate depending on what day it is. Sometimes there's a lot of food and sometimes it's like half of it's missing

The staff was really nice. When we ordered a muffin and they ran out of muffins they gave us three cookies to make up for it. The food is extremely expensive but exquisite. The mac & cheese was great. Their chicken frontera was ok. Their chips are legendary. Overall I had a great time at Panera. Their bathrooms are really clean.

Went to meet someone there and the dining room was closed due to short staffing issues and then I couldn't even use cash to order I didn't have a card to use. I still never have had their food though  but I did find a sandwich on the menu that sounded amazing.

What's the point of curbside delivery if you have to go inside and get it yourself? Sat in the spot which I notified them I was in for 10 minutes before calling the store only for no one to answer the phone. Went inside explained my situation to the cashier only to have him point to a mobile order pickup rack where my food had clearly been sitting.
This is one of the nicest Panera Breads. Ordered on the APP and my order was perfect.
Buena atencion, buena comida...
If you are not utilizing sips unlimited you are missing out. The order system and quickness of the staff makes it a quick stop
Great food
Just went there.  Ordered bowl o chicken noodle soup and got a cup.  Ordered Baja bowl, no chicken i it.  Spent 20.25, for this???? Not again.
Panera is good food and drinks. This one lives up to the reputation of others.
Excellent food, good price, nice environment and prompt service
Everything was good, I enjoy my meal.
Healthy food that's also very tasty.  Great customer service
Very polite and my order was correct .
Very fresh food

I love this Panera location. They recently built it, and it's a free-standing location (not in a plaza). They currently have the special where you can pay $9.99 per month and have unlimited beverages (soft drinks, teas, lemonade, or drip coffee). Personally, I feel that this is a pretty good deal, if you can get there 3 or 4 times a month. The staff is generally pretty polite, friendly, and helpful. The managers always seem to go above and beyond.
Nice place to enjoy a nice meal, the staff was friendly, and the prices where just fine, the food was delicious

My wife and I are loyal customers to the indian trial location. Today was the first time eating inside to do work and the wifi is terrible. They blamed it on the number of people on the network but Im the only person with a laptop and no one is using their phone. Will go to starbucks next time.
Food was good. I had a gift card and was not disappointed.

I have been there 3 times since the move love the food,but all 3 times I tried to order the kitchen cookie they were sold out. Tonight I mentioned to the staff that this was the third time I have tried to get the Kitchen cookie her response is we sell out at breakfast. If you know this why don't you plan better. Tonight took a little longer than usual because they didn't bother to check the order and gave my order to another car. So I had to wait for my order to be fixed again. They offered me a muffin but I told them I would rather have the kitchen cookie they were out of.

Place is easy to get into and out of Planet parking kind of handicapped parking fairly new place is clean inside or outside the help is very curious and the food was delicious go back there again and the prices a food was very reasonable
Servers are friendly and helpful. Food very tasty.
Todo muy limpio y la comida y cafe rico, lo recomiendo

Every two weeks we made a large order to go but last two times our order was incomplete.
First time I called them but they didn't really care about it.
Second time I called them but they never answered my call.
Today I come and decide to speak with the manager. What I received? An apology with an angry face. That's all.
Most of the employees are super nice. Today's manager not at all .
Same quality every time and quicker than most panaras.

I did my order on the at quiosque, and I add a double chicken. After the system ask me what size : I change the regular "whole" to "half". When I did this option, the system canceled my "add chicken ". When I take my order salad with chicken, I saw a little piece the chicken. I don't received double chicken. Attention... double check your order in this place.

This is the first and last time I get food from here. We waited for over 45 minutes on our food, while watching car after car get there food that ordered after us. When I asked the girl who was hand delivering them to the cars she done her best with trying to get it put together but obviously was still waiting on the kitchen to finish. She gave is two cookies for free. Didn't make up for how long it took, but it was a nice jesture.
They are really good

At the Indian Trail location, I picked up my order of the 1/2 Frontega chicken panini and cup of vegetable soup. Both were delicious. BUT, why was there only 2 small, I mean small,  morsels of chicken between the bread??? That was very disappointing.
Nice people.  Great salads.
Great pizza and so many options

Did not receive1 item ticket did not have phone # called them three time and their system cut me off (no human interface but ticket says accuracy matters if not right let a manager know good luck with that

We went to the location in Indian Trail. Ordered 4 different sandwich . NOTHING TO DO with the Advertising. Took them more than 40 minutes to get the order ready. When we get home, ALL 4 SANDWICH were filled partially. The order costs us more than $40. Bread are not bad but inside, is not full filled.  This was our first and last time buying In Panera

The WORST Pantera Bread in town. They are always out of ingredients. And I waited 20 MINUTES in the drive thru without any food. I had to ask for my money back, and that was apparently IMPOSSIBLE for them to figure out. After literally 25 minutes of waiting on my food and no refund, I had to leave the restaurant without my food or my money!!

NEVER GO TO THIS PANERA!
Esta  bien buen menu,  limpio y rapidos
Love this location
Live for this place

I'll be fair, Panera has good food, however I believe this is a new location as they moved across the street. Dined in, wasn't impressed. Ordered through the kiosk which was rather easy, however, they prepared one of our salads wrong. What's the point of customizing a salad to take things OFF the salad, if they intend on keeping it on the salad anyway? Pay too much to pick through your food to get what you actually ordered. Asked for no tomato's and onions... Got it anyway.
Excellent customer service. Food always delicious. Pepperoni flatbread pizza voted by my son as the most delicious.
Love their coffee and their sandwiches... especially the Turkey Bacon Bravo. Plus their 10 Vegetables Soup tops the meal off.

I ordered a half chicken salad sandwich with a poppy seed salad.  The sandwich had 2thin slices of unripe tomatoes,  lettuce and maybe a half of teaspoon of chicken salad. The salad would have been ok if it hadn't had alot of wilted lettuce that made the salad very bitter . So pretty much the sour dough bread was the only thing that was  edible in my opinion.  So if you want to pay 19.00dollars for a piece of bread  I recommend eating here if not I  recommend you pick up your order  before  paying.
Don't go it's terrible

Love this new Panera.  It's bright, open & airy.
Food was delicious.   Always love the summer Strawberry Poppyseed salad.

Love Panera! But ever since you guys moved across the street there is no light roast coffee availavle when we stop in :) ...always have to wait for a new pot. To improve maybe put some kind of indicator blinking..

Just a thought..

I'm sad to leave two stars but I always come to Panera when I'm not feeling well. Im currently pregnant and nauseous abd can't eat much. All I wanted was a bowl of chicken noodle soup this evening. I paid 7 dollars to get all broth and literally 3 pieces of noodles and chicken . More than likely it was the bottom of what was left in the pot. I get there was an hour left until you guys closed but at least let someone know the soup is almost out. Very dissatisfied  Panera.
The flatbread pizza was delicious and the broccoli cheddar is always a hit. The tomato basil bread with Turkey and tomatoes wife said was delicious.
